meta.description: Learn about our yoga philosophy, styles, teachers, and practice spaces in CDMX

yoga.defaultText: Yoga is an ancient practice of developing harmony between body, mind and spirit. It is an exploration of who we are as human beings. It teaches us to be mindful of our thoughts and emotions, and it helps us heal both physically and internally. To master yoga is to master yourself; to dwell firm in the present moment.

texts.art: Yoga is an art and a creative process. When we practice, unique combinations of graceful movements and breathing make our bodies vessels of cosmic energy. Because of this, each yoga experience is distinctly unique; a symphony of stillness and movement.
texts.science: Yoga is a science of awareness. In yoga, we research how different practices affect the flow of energy in the body and the subconscious mind. Thus we can use it more consciously for self-transformation.
texts.lifestyle: Yoga is a way to live your life more consciously. Small things such as regular exercise and meditation, healthy diet, and a positive attitude to life can totally change your daily experience.
texts.philosophy: Yoga is a philosophy of life. It touches questions such as who we are, what is this world we are living in, and how to achieve happiness. Yoga is a pathway to what some call enlightenment - freedom from suffering, from the world of form.

physical.title: Physical Health
physical.text: Improve flexibility, strength, and balance through regular practice.

mental.title: Mental Clarity
mental.text: Reduce stress and enhance focus through mindful breathing and meditation.

spiritual.title: Spiritual Growth
spiritual.text: Connect with your inner self and discover deeper meaning in life.

emotional.title: Emotional Balance
emotional.text: Cultivate inner peace and emotional resilience through consistent practice.

aerial.name: Aerial Yoga
aerial.description: Practice yoga suspended in silk hammocks, combining traditional poses with aerial arts for a unique, gravity-defying experience.

vinyasa.name: Vinyasa
vinyasa.description: Flow through sequences of poses synchronized with breath, creating a dynamic and meditative practice that builds heat and focus.

hatha.name: Hatha
hatha.description: A gentle, foundational practice focusing on physical postures and breathing techniques, perfect for beginners and all levels.

kundalini.name: Kundalini
kundalini.description: Awaken your inner energy through dynamic movements, breathwork, meditation, and mantra chanting for spiritual transformation.

teachers.title: Meet Our Teachers
teachers.subtitle: Experienced guides on your yoga journey

teacher1.name: Harjeet Singh
teacher1.bio: With over 10 years of practice and study, Harjeet brings deep wisdom and compassionate guidance to every class. His teaching style emphasizes mindfulness and spiritual connection.

teacher2.name: María González
teacher2.bio: María's gentle approach and attention to alignment make her classes accessible to all levels. She specializes in helping students build confidence and strength.

teacher3.name: Sofia Martínez
teacher3.bio: Sofia's dynamic flows blend creativity with precision. Her classes are energizing yet meditative, perfect for those seeking a challenging practice.

teacher4.name: Carlos Hernández
teacher4.bio: Carlos guides students on profound inner journeys through breathwork and meditation. His classes focus on transformation and awakening.

teacher5.name: Ana López
teacher5.bio: Ana's playful spirit and expert guidance make aerial yoga accessible and fun. She helps students overcome fear and discover new possibilities.

space1.name: Roma Studio
space1.description: Our main studio in the heart of Roma Norte offers a peaceful sanctuary for your practice. The space features high ceilings, bamboo floors, and abundant natural light.
space1.details: Spacious studio with natural light and serene atmosphere

space2.name: Condesa Sanctuary
space2.description: Located in beautiful Condesa, this intimate space is perfect for small group classes and private sessions. Features include a garden view and eco-friendly materials.
space2.details: Intimate space perfect for small groups and private sessions
